description: This file defines a stubbed StripeService class that provides an interface for creating checkout sessions and verifying webhooks in a Stripe integration, using settings fetched from a configuration module.

classes.name: StripeService
classes.description: A stub implementation of a Stripe service used for creating checkout sessions and verifying webhook signatures.

methods.name: dict create_checkout_session(self, price_id: str, customer_email: str, success_url: str, cancel_url: str)
methods.description: Creates a dummy checkout session with provided parameters, returning a mocked session object.

methods.name: dict verify_webhook(self, payload: bytes, sig_header: str)
methods.description: Verifies a webhook signature and returns a mocked event data.

ctags.name: create_checkout_session
ctags.pattern: /^    def create_checkout_session(self, price_id: str, customer_email: str, success_url: str, canc/
ctags.signature: (self, price_id: str, customer_email: str, success_url: str, cancel_url: str)

ctags.name: verify_webhook
ctags.pattern: /^    def verify_webhook(self, payload: bytes, sig_header: str) -> dict:$/
